Based in Sion and led by a team of passionate people committed to the planet.
 
 We offer expeditions from 2 to 15 days in small groups, for all sport levels, everywhere in Valais.
 
 Our credo is to make you live a strong reconnection with nature, and a unique experience of surpassing oneself, while preserving the environments crossed during your program.
Our excursions > Our guides > Intranet > Contact > Settings >

SnowShoes is a young and dynamic company whose goal is to open access to mountain excursions to as many people as possible. 
 
 Present on the market for 3 years, we have quickly succeeded in making a place for ourselves in the sports world. 
 
 Our guides are all recognized experts in the field. Thanks to this website, you will be able to consult our numerous excursions and make an appointment directly with the guide of your choice. 
 
 Launch yourself now in an adventure from which you will not leave unscathed !
